Welcome

We have plenty of options for everyone in our Ballard taproom. Our main bar flows out to ample, covered seating in front of a large garage door. We also have a spacious beer garden with fire-pit seating. Many of our outside areas have overhead heating. Kids and well behaved dogs are welcome in the main taproom, out front and in the beer garden. All seating is first-come/first serve with the exception of private events. Upstairs at Stoup is reserved for 21+ humans only.
Kegs To-Go Order + Pay

Off the Rez
What Else do we offer? In addition to the beers listed below, we also have a wider variety of non-beer options from Hop Water and Jones Soda to alcohol free beers and Kombucha to cider and wine.

What's on Tap

German Style PilsnerABV: 5.20% Bavarian HefeweizenABV: 5.00% Mosaic Pale AleABV: 5.30% Citra IPAABV: 5.90% Easy A IPAABV: 6.40% Sandals & Flannels Hazy IPAABV: 6.40% Rainbow Bubbles IPAABV: 6.30% Paraderade IPAABV: 6.70% RoseYay Raspberry SourABV: 5.20% Good Times Machine IPAABV: 7.20% NW RedABV: 5.00% Cervecita Mexican LagerABV: 4.80% Robust PorterABV: 6.20% Sole FrescoABV: 6.42% American StoutABV: 6.60% Black is Beautiful Baltic PorterABV: 7.50% Fuzz Buster Hazy IPAABV: 7.30%

German Style Pilsner

ABV: 5.20    IBU: 37.00    SRM: 3.00
Imported German 2-row barley and Roy Farms Adeena hops give this German-style pils its crisp, clean character. Warning: this beer's subtle grain sweetness, spicy hop aroma and refreshingly dry, hop-forward finish may elicit a spontaneous Prost!
AWARDS: 2017 Silver Medal-SIP NW Best of the NW
Categories: German, Lager, Pilsner, Water Driven, Malt Driven

Bavarian Hefeweizen

ABV: 5.00    IBU: 13.00    SRM: 4.00
Close your eyes, take a sip of this beer and you’re sure to be transported to a tree-lined, sun-speckled biergarten in Munich. We honor tradition by brewing this beer using decoction mashing techniques and fermenting with a German yeast strain that imparts prominent banana and clove notes. The wheat gives this beer a crisp, slightly tart, refreshing finish. AWARDS: 2019 Gold Medal-North American Brewers Association, 2016 Gold Medal-WA Beer Awards, 2015 Silver Medal-WA Beer Awards, 2014 Gold Medal-WA Beer Awards
Categories: Bavarian, Wheat, Traditionally Spring, Traditionally Summer, Yeast Driven, Malt Driven

Mosaic Pale Ale

ABV: 5.30    IBU: 39.00    SRM: 5.00
A highly drinkable, hop forward beer with a classic American Pale Ale malt bill. Heavy handed Mosaic dry hopping gives this beer a nose packed full of citrus and mango. Up front aroma, balanced bittering and a moderate body just beg for another taste...and another...and another...
AWARDS: 2021 Silver Medal-Great American Beer Festival, 2019 Silver Medal-SIP NW Best of the Northwest, 2019 Bronze Medal-Best of Craft Beer Awards, 2018 Silver Medal-WA Beer Awards, 2017 Judges Pick-SIP NW Best of the NW
Categories: Northwest, Pale, Hop Driven

Citra IPA

ABV: 5.90    IBU: 50.00    SRM: 3.00
We like to call this one Sunshine In a Glass ... or Sunshine In Your Belly because it won't stay in that glass long. Our Citra® IPA is designed to be light and bright in both color and body. Your first sniff will elicit images of tropical fruit and citrus thanks to a healthy dose of Citra® hops. Enjoy a pint of this and you might just find yourself gazing skyward, pondering how in the heck sunshine made its way into your glass.
AWARDS: 2019 Silver Medal-WA Beer Awards, 2019 Bronze Medal-Best of Craft Beer Awards, Silver Medal- SIP NW Best of the NW, 2015 Silver Medal-WA Beer Awards
Categories: IPA, Northwest, Hop Driven

Easy A IPA

ABV: 6.40    IBU: 56.00    SRM: 4.00
We didn't even study for this one, Galaxy and Simcoe hops make this one an Easy A. The aroma and flavor is chock-full of Guava, citrus & a bit of pine. The fruit carries to the finish begging another taste.
Categories: IPA, Northwest, Hop Driven

Sandals & Flannels Hazy IPA

ABV: 6.40    IBU: 47.00    SRM: 4.00
You know the story. We're nostalgic for 90's Seattle when the sound of grunge music and the smells of patchouli filled the air. Sometimes we like to relive the good ole days while reveling in new trends like Hazy IPA. So we brew a batch of this beer, pack it with the brightest, berriest, peachiest, tropical fruitiest hops we can find, like Cryo POP!, El Dorado and Mosaic Cryo. And then we sit back, sip, and trip on down memory lane.
Categories: Hazy, IPA, Hop Driven

Rainbow Bubbles IPA

ABV: 6.30    IBU: 52.00    SRM: 3.00

Our Stoup Pride month IPA is simply joy in a glass. Feast your eyes on a giddy dance of bubbles in every color of the rainbow while enjoying the aromas of Hallertau Blanc, Nelson Sauvin and HBC 630. So as not to overpower the delicate aromas of gooseberry, white grape and tropical fruit, we kept the malt bill soft with additions of wheat and pilsner malt. It's moderately dry and extremely crushable. We raise a glass of Rainbow Bubbles IPA to equality, compassion, and the incredible gift of loving people for who they are. (Disclaimer: the bubbles are NOT rainbow colored. That's impossible, silly). Proceeds from this beer support a local organization that lifts our LGBT community. See our social media channels for this year's recipient.

Categories: IPA, Northwest, Traditionally Summer, Hop Driven

Paraderade IPA

ABV: 6.70    IBU: 60.00    SRM: 4.00
Our LGBTQIA+ friends and allies are coming together to celebrate a vibrant, beautiful community. We brewed this beer to help fuel the passion for equality and acceptance and also to just have some fun together. While Pride is much more than a parade, we still love a good march down the street. Think of this beer as fuel for your Pride parade! Hops: Enigma, Chinook and Comet. This is our second Pride beer. Hops: Citra Cryo, Comet, Mosaic Cryo.
Categories: IPA, Northwest, Hop Driven

RoseYay Raspberry Sour

ABV: 5.20    IBU: 4.00    SRM: 8.00
Pink, spritzy and tart with prominent raspberry presence. Kind of like a rose with raspberries. RoseYay!
Categories: Sour

Good Times Machine IPA

ABV: 7.20    IBU: 60.00    SRM: 4.00
Sometimes a van is more than a vehicle. It can rise above and become a party on wheels, a symbol of freedom, a carpet-walled sanctuary. A GOOD TIMES MACHINE. Sometimes a beer can follow suit. It's not just barley, water, yeast and hops. It's a magical elixir. A party in a pint glass. A GOOD TIMES MACHINE IPA. To reach this pinnacle of carefree and cool, a beer's got to be loaded with some pretty groovy hops. These hops deliver the essence of tropical fruit, citrus and berry. This is no regular day IPA, this is a Good Times Machine IPA!
Categories: IPA, Northwest, Hop Driven

NW Red

ABV: 5.00    IBU: 40.00    SRM: 12.00
Our Northwest Red Ale provides a distinctly Northwest hop character balanced with a restrained malt sweetness. We use 2 Row barley along with Best Maltz Red X to create a rich, red color and a smooth, satisfying taste. A hint of chocolate seals the deal.
AWARDS: 2021 Silver Medal-Great American Beer Festival
Categories: Northwest, Hop Driven, Malt Driven

Cervecita Mexican Lager

ABV: 4.80    IBU: 14.00    SRM: 2.00
Our Mexican Lager is perfect for sunny days on the patio or the beach...preferably in flip flops. Since we can't guarantee sunny days in Seattle, we kept this lager light and bright and irresistibly crushable, sunshine not required. Salud!
Categories: Lager, Traditionally Summer, Water Driven, Malt Driven

Robust Porter

ABV: 6.20    IBU: 45.00    SRM: 31.00
Rich in color and character, our robust porter conjures up memories of decadent chocolate treats dipped in coffee. Hints of dark chocolate, roasted coffee and light malty sweetness are the result of a complex malt profile including chocolate malt, roasted wheat and roasted rye.

AWARDS: 2019 Judges Pick-SIP NW Best of the Northwest, 2019 Silver Medal - North American Brewers Association, 2018 Silver Medal-WA Beer Awards, 2017 Double Gold Medal-Sip NW Best of the NW, 2017 Gold Medal-WA Beer Awards, 2016 Silver Medal-WA Beer Awards, 2014 Silver Medal World Beer Cup & WA Beer Awards

Categories: Northwest, Porter, Malt Driven

Sole Fresco

Lemon Selz

ABV: 6.42    IBU: 0.00    SRM: 0.00
Lemon Seltzer / Descriptors: Tart Lemon. Refreshing. Effervescent.
A tart, limoncello spritz inspired refresher with just enough sweetness to balance it all out. It's lemon. It's effervescent. It's fun!

American Stout

ABV: 6.60    IBU: 74.00    SRM: 47.00

This beer is built on 2-row, Black Patent, Chocolate and Crystal malts and some roasted barley for a touch of roast. It's robust in flavor but moderate in ABV. Additions of Citra, Simcoe and Cascade Cryo add subtle notes of pine and citrus.

Silver Medal Winner: 2024 GABF
Categories: Stout

Black is Beautiful Baltic Porter

ABV: 7.50    IBU: 35.00    SRM: 36.00
Our Baltic Porter was built on a base of 2-row, Munich and Mild malts for a malt forward, rich flavor. It was made smooth through fermentation with lager yeast and extended cold fermentation. We brewed this to continue the tradition of Black is Beautiful, a campaign to celebrate the contributions of black brewers in the craft beer industry. A portion of proceeds from this beer will be donated to The National Black Brewers Association.
Categories: Lager, Porter, Malt Driven

Fuzz Buster Hazy IPA

ABV: 7.30    IBU: 58.00    SRM: 4.00
This beer is on the fast track to delicious. Nothing is gonna slow it down. Hazy with a soft malt bill and loads of Krush, Krush Cryo, Nelson Sauvin, Citra Cryo and Citra Spectrum, this beer brings passionfruit, citrus and sweet fruit aromas at speeds that will make your head spin.
Categories: Hazy, IPA
